txt.en: 'It was good of Gifemund to try to remember his tale. What do you think you will do next?'
'I will tell you everything I can recall from that day, [placeholder].'
'For your help, kind stranger, I have done my best to think back to the day we fled Dunfast.\n\n'If you would like to hear it, I can share my tale.'
'Let us hear what these villagers have to say. Maybe they observed something noteworthy.'
Cyneberg hopes that the people from Dunfast will be able to recall what happened when NÃºrzum arrived, now that their survival is assured.
'Find out what you must, but then let us leave. Make haste!'
Gifemund can be found at the refugees' hideout in the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should talk to Gifemund to find out more about the refugees' story.
Cyneberg is at the refugees' hideout south-west of Dunfast.\n\nYou should speak with Cyneberg.
